full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RDO RJE 'DZIN PA CHEN PO BLO BZANG RIG GROL GYI GSUNG LAS RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSNYEN YIG MTHONG BA LDAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @034A *, ,ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BSNYEN YIG MTHONG BA DON LDAN 'DI NI RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, RDO RJE 'DZIN PA BLO BZANG REG GROL GYIS SHANGS PHU BDE CHEN SGRUB PA'I SDER SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG GYUR CIG , ,,)
